name: Animated Isometric Halloween Pumpkin Spider
description:
Isometric 2D Pumpkin Spider

  •  Animated in 16 directions with 22.5 degree step - very smooth look
  • 6 animations: Attack; Death; Hit; Idle; Intimidate; Run; 
  • Separate shadow layer to adjust shadow and sun positions to your map (shadow sprite can be distorted/transformated according to sun direction)
  • 512x512 frame size HQ variant for advanced cases or edit or downscale
  • 256x256 frames to build your own spritesheets format
  • 256x frame-size highly optimized RGBA4444 game-ready spritesheets

Important! Very good practice is to dinamically load/preload/unload and cache single animations to prevent of use lot of memory.  Optimizations  are care of developers )

Feel free to contact if you need different frame size or frames quantity for special purposes

Will be very handy for RPG, Tower Defence,  RTS, Turn-by-turn battle games and other.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Sprite pack can be used in both commercial and non-commercial projects. Number of projects is not limited, feel free. Also you can modify these sprites for your needs.

But you cannot resel source or modified sprites as any kind of «assets package» or allow end-user or third party to download or copy this package from you or your application. You cannot  sell contents as NFT.

Credit not required, but appreciated ;-)
